question: how to make corn succotash
options: Melt 3 tablespoons butter in a ice cream churn. Saute 1 chopped red bell pepper, 2 minutes. Add 2 1/2 cups raw corn kernels, 1 cup thawed frozen lima beans, 1/4 cup water, 2 teaspoons chopped thyme, and salt and pepper to taste. Cover; simmer 5 minutes. Stir in 2 sliced scallions.

Melt 3 tablespoons butter in a skillet. Saute 1 chopped red bell pepper, 2 minutes. Add 2 1/2 cups raw corn kernels, 1 cup thawed frozen lima beans, 1/4 cup water, 2 teaspoons chopped thyme, and salt and pepper to taste. Cover; simmer 5 minutes. Stir in 2 sliced scallions.

question: How to make sun catchers in christmas (or other holiday) shapes
options: Place any metal cookie cutters that you like on a metal cookie sheet. Gently place one layer of pony beads in the cookie cutters in the color patters that you like. Once cool, apply a dot of hot glue and put a string to hang your creations.

question: How to Make Peach Puree
